itemLabel: George Robertson, Baron Robertson of Port Ellen

wikipedia_page.main: George Islay MacNeill Robertson, Baron Robertson of Port Ellen,  (born 12 April 1946), is a British politician of the Labour Party who served as the 10th Secretary General of NATO from 1999 to 2004; he succeeded Javier Solana. He served as Secretary of State for Defence from 1997 to 1999, before becoming a life peer being created Baron Robertson of Port Ellen, of Islay in Argyll and Bute, on 24 August 1999.
